title: Introducing: WHITE
body:
I stumbled across _Living Fiction_, what is seemingly the debut track from Glasgow’s **WHITE** last week and what a find it was.

Drenched in a Franz Ferdinand swagger, the track is all angular guitars and unbashed confidence, especially for a band still in it’s infancy. Synthesizers bubble and guitars chime as an infectious, almost tongue-in-cheek vocal hook dominates this synthetic guitar -pop banger.

Stream Living Fiction below:

\[soundcloud url=”https://api.soundcloud.com/tracks/148378123″ params=”auto\_play=false&hide\_related=false&visual=true” width=”100%” height=”450″ iframe=”true” /\]
